features: 💦 Portable Washer Machine: Our mini portable washing machine is small and lightweight, making portable washer easy to carry. Portable clothes washing machines are perfect for small spaces and on-the-go living, allowing you to do your laundry wherever you are. Our small portable washer can be easily stored in a small space, small washing machine portable won't take up much room in your apartment, dorm, RV, or camping gear, allowing you to keep your living space organized.

💦10L Large Capacity Design: Enjoy an effortless washing experience with our mini washing machine featuring a 10-liter large capacity, ensuring you can handle more laundry at once for increased efficiency.

💦Versatile Time Modes: Our portable clothe washer has 3 intelligent time modes, including 2 minutes, 10 minutes, and 15 minutes, to meet various washing needs. From quick cleans to deep washing, it caters to the cleaning requirements of different types of clothing.

💦 Time-saving and Convenient: Our small washer machine portable allows you to do your laundry in the comfort of your own home or on-the-go, saving you time and effort. No more waiting in line at the laundromat or wasting time hand-washing clothes. Small portable washing machine is a convenient solution for busy lifestyles.

💦 Eco-friendly and Cost-effective: Our mini washer machine portable uses less water and detergent compared to traditional washing machines, making folding mini washing machine eco-friendly and cost-effective. You can save money on water bills and reduce your environmental footprint, all while enjoying clean and fresh clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Mini Washer Redefining Small-Space Living
reviews.reviewText: Design and Build Quality: The mini washer boasts a sleek and compact design, making it an ideal choice for those with limited living space. Despite its small footprint, the build quality does not compromise, offering a sturdy and durable appliance that can withstand regular use.Capacity and Efficiency: With a surprisingly spacious interior for its size, the mini washer can comfortably accommodate the laundry needs of individuals or small households. Its efficient operation ensures that clothes are cleaned thoroughly while conserving water and energy, making it an eco-friendly option for the conscious consumer.Ease of Use: The intuitive interface and straightforward controls make the mini washer incredibly user-friendly. Even those new to using home appliances will find the operation hassle-free. The addition of customizable wash settings allows users to cater the washing process to different fabric types and soil levels.Performance: The mini washer delivers impressive cleaning results, rivaling that of larger models. The powerful motor ensures consistent performance across various types of laundry, leaving clothes fresh and clean. The spin cycle is effective in removing excess water, significantly reducing drying time.Noise and Vibration: One of the standout features of the mini washer is its quiet operation. The appliance is designed to minimize noise and vibration, making it perfect for use in apartments or late at night without disturbing others.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Portable Washer!
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this 10L Folding Mini Washer, and it's a game-changer for my apartment and travel needs. It's incredibly compact and easy to store. With three modes, it cleans underwear and baby clothes thoroughly, making it perfect for small spaces and on-the-go use. It's efficient, saving both water and energy. Setup is quick, and its performance on delicate items is impressive. Ideal for apartments, dorms, camping, and RV travel. Highly recommend for anyone looking to save space and time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best small washing machine
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is so far one of my favorite product I ordered on Amazon. It looked small but this washing machine can hold 10L of water which is almost 2.5 gallons.I didn't have had high hopes from it but to my surprise it really cleaned the clothes very well. It's super easy to use and looks amazing. It's kinda loud than I expected but it gets the job done. My partner liked the purple color of this machine. I can easily fold it after the use and quickly unfold it when i need it. I used it for 8-10 times so far and it worked very well every single time. It came with rinse basket but I didn't find it much useful. Apart from that this a great machine. if you are looking for small washing machine then search no further...This is it!!

reviews.reviewText: This machine is a laundry superhero in a compact package. Living in a cozy apartment, I needed something that wouldn't take up much space but still get the job done. I love that it's foldable, it's like having a laundry helper that doesn't take up much space. Perfect for my apartment living.
